definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Collects the golden company to increase holds is the thunderclap big raindrop is small.
sentences.chinese: 匯金公司的增持更是雷聲大雨點小。

sentences.english: Huijin said it would buy more shares over the next 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 中央匯金表示，在未來12個月還將買進更多股票。

sentences.english: The Ministry of Finance and the sovereign-wealth fund now share ownership of the lender.
sentences.chinese: 財政部和中央匯金現在共同持股農行。
